name: Alex Johnson
title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
bio: Passionate developer creating amazing digital experiences with modern technologies and creative design solutions.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather dashboard with data visualization, forecasting, and location-based weather tracking using modern APIs.
